address: 400 Broadhollow Road, Suite 5, Farmingdale, New York 11735; 300 Sunrise Highway, West Babylon, New York 11704; 1 Maple Ave, White Plains, New York 10605
title: New York Regional Single-Family Home Price Jumps 8.4% in August 2024
description: OneKey® MLS reports a closed median price of $725,000 for single-family residences in New York metropolitan region in August, a boost of 8.4% from 2023. The report highlights significant trends in the housing market, including increases in median sale prices for single-family homes, condominiums, and co-ops, despite a decrease in transaction volumes.
author: Tricia Chirco
name: OneKey® MLS
